name: Colombian small-eared shrew
description: The Colombian small-eared shrew is a species of mammal in the family Soricidae. It is endemic to Colombia, where it is known from the Cordillera Central in Antioquia Department at elevations from 1,750 to 2,800Â m. It is found in montane forest and cultivated areas. It resembles C. brachyonyx.
